mdRecord.dcterms:title: Virginia State Firemen's Association Memorandum, Proposed Constitutional Changes, and Dues Card, c. 1954
mdRecord.dcterms:description: VA State Firemen's Association 1954 Memorandum, containing multiple attachments, the first being a dues payment card, and the other being a copy of the association constitution and proposed changes to said constitution.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Fire departments
Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
